specs.label: Driver
specs.value: 62 mm x 34 mm single-ended planar magnetic

specs.label: Driver matching
specs.value: +/-2 dB to target curve, 0.5 dB channel match weighted 30-8 kHz

specs.label: Cable
specs.value: Detachable 2 m premium cable (standard 1/4" with 3.5 mm or 4-pin XLR; optional VIVO upgrades)

specs.label: Includes
specs.value: ÆON 2 Noire headphone, carry case, 1/4" with 3.5mm or 4-pin XLR cable (upgrades optional), certificate, manual, tuning kit

specs.label: Notes
specs.value: TrueFlow V2 motor, V-Planar driver processing, folding gimbal, lightweight titanium/aluminum/carbon construction
